title: My life with my family

abstract: 'My parents have given up so much for all of us children, and I hope that I can give the same back.'
description: Life, so far, has been quite a struggle for Negabanchi Tebeje and her family. With her dad fighting for democracy, the Tebeje family have moved from Ethiopia to Sudan and, finally, Australia.
